Paragraph: Bimolecular recombination was also investigated by measuring the dependence of J sc against light intensity , in which the exponential factor α in the power law of J sc ∝ P light α is used Article to indicate bimolecular recombination in the BHJ film.

The material name "BHJ film" is explicitly mentioned in the paragraph as the subject of the investigation.

| --- |
| BHJ film |

Explanation:

The only clear material name mentioned in the paragraph is "BHJ film". The other terms, such as "bimolecular recombination" and "light intensity," refer to processes or properties, not materials.
